Posts.Content: Aug 21, 2017 01:57AM Valentinazevallos wrote: Neck surgery a year ago left an unsightly scar that religious use of dermalmd scar serum everyday now for a year has almost completely disappeared. also had appendix removal 6 months ago and that scar is almost gone as well. don't expect immediate results, you have to use it for a year before you start feeling good about it.
Posts.Title: Unsightly scars cruzsuz Kicks
